#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
typedef vector<int> vi;
#define F(i,a,b) for(int i = (int)(a); i <= (int)(b); i++)
#define RF(i,a,b) for(int i = (int)(a); i >= (int)(b); i--)
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define gc getchar_unlocked
int read_int(){
    register int x = 0, c = gc();
    int sign = 1;
    while(c!='-' && (c<48 || c>57) ) c = gc();
    if(c=='-')
        sign = -1, c = gc();
    while(c>=48 && c<=57)
        x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48, c = gc();
    return sign*x;
}
int main()
{
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
        freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
    #endif
    char P[1000005];
    int Q,L,R,len,K;
    char ch;
    scanf("%s",P);
    len = strlen(P);
    vector<vi> dp;
    dp.resize(26);
    F(i,0,25) dp[i].resize(len+1);
    F(i,0,25) dp[i][0] = 0;
    F(i,1,len)
    {
        F(j,0,25) dp[j][i] = dp[j][i-1];
        dp[P[i-1]-'a'][i]++;
    }
    Q = read_int();
    while(Q--)
    {
        cin>>ch;
        //scanf("%[^ \n]",&ch);
        L = read_int();
        R = read_int();
        K = ch - 'a';
        printf("%d\n",dp[K][R]- dp[K][L-1]);
    }
    return 0;
}
